entry.title: Hello world
entry.content:
Well, everyone knows how hard writing can be (even more challenging in another language far aside from you mother one), so this is a attempt to improve this particular skill, and spread some information in the data sea which currently compose majority of VIRTUALITY.

Oh yes, this artificial world who surrounding our existence is growing in exponential rates, the virtual interface will be the only bridge to access the present, understand the pass, unveil the future, the final interlink, no more prisons for the mind, no more insignificant worlds to conquer, a free singularity, a clear horizon blossoming in the dawn breeze, nothing and everything at the same time, existential detachment history, the new paradigm that will obliterate every obsolete obstacle in its path.

Aw. I lost my train of thought here.

This blog will certainly come in hand to achieve this minor goal and a lot of friends advise me to have some online presence, so you are welcome, beware though, this articles are just daydreams from a troubled, disruptive inner eye.

And where does the newborn go from here? The net is vast and infinite.

Puzzle: The Invisible Shove it
